frontmatter.title: 在ASP中使用正则表达式从完整路径中解析出文件名与不含文件名的路径
frontmatter.stackbit_url_path: posts/在ASP中使用正则表达式从完整路径中解析出文件名与不含文件名的路径

pageContext.html:
<pre style="text-indent: 0;" class="brush: vb"><%
    ' 从文件完整路径中解析文件名
    Public Function ParseName(ByRef sFullPath)
        Dim re, sFileName, oMatches
        Set re = Server.CreateObject("VBScript.RegExp")
        re.Pattern = "[^\\]*{1}quot;
        Set oMatches = re.Execute(sFullPath)
        
        If oMatches.Count > 0 Then
            sFileName = oMatches(0)
        Else
            sFileName = ""
        End If
        Set oMatches = Nothing
        Set re = Nothing
        
        ParseName = sFileName
    End Function
    
    ' 从文件完整路径中去掉文件名
    Public Function ParsePath(ByRef sFullPath)
        Dim re, sFilePath, oMatches
        Set re = Server.CreateObject("VBScript.RegExp")
        re.Pattern = "^.*\\(?=[^\\]*$)"
        Set oMatches = re.Execute(sFullPath)
        
        If oMatches.Count > 0 Then
            sFilePath = oMatches(0)
        Else
            sFilePath = ""
        End If
        Set oMatches = Nothing
        Set re = Nothing
        
        ParsePath = sFilePath
    End Function

%>
